arts.ttl: Fiorentina confirm Gudmundsson’s Injury: Recovery timeline revealed
arts.sum: Fiorentina have released the eagerly awaited results of the medical examinations undergone by Icelandic number 10 Albert Gudmundsson. The former Genoa player was forced off the pitch after just 5 minutes during the match that Fiorentina went on to win 6-0 against Lecce in Salento. The official club statement reads: “ACF Fiorentina announces that this morning, player Albert Gudmundsson underwent radiological tests to assess the extent of the injury sustained during the match against Lecce on Sunday, October 20. The diagnostic examinations revealed a grade I/II lesion of the myotendinous junction of the biceps femoris in the right thigh. arts.ttl: Conference League | Gallen v Fiorentina: Match Preview
arts.sum: As the UEFA Conference League resumes action, Fiorentina travels to Switzerland to face St Gallen at Kybunpark on Thursday evening. The Italian side, finalists in the last two editions of the competition, look to build on their strong start to the group stage against a St Gallen team that has struggled in recent weeks. After a shaky start to their Serie A campaign under new manager Raffaele Palladino, Fiorentina has found their footing in recent weeks.
